title: Running with a Bag and Bun - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Fantasy   Romance   School Life   Slice of Life   Yaoi
tags: Artists   Autism   College/University   Doting Older Siblings   Mpreg   Poor Protagonist   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Straight Seme   Time Skip   Wealthy Characters
author: Small Rice Dimple   米粒小酒窝
description:
This is a story about a little shou accidentally falling in love with a straight man.

Qi Yue: Qi Mingyu, I like you!

Qi Mingyu: I don’t like men.

Qi Yue: QAQ I am pregnant with your baby! Dare you not admit it!

Qi Mingyu: …

Qi Yue never knew about his special physique. When he was discouraged, he unexpectedly discovered that he was pregnant with a child. As a man, this is an incredible thing! Now baozi is growing up and Qi Yue has also matured. He is no longer the one who takes love as everything, but who knows that the man who has become more mature and attractive is holding on to him now.

Qi Yue: Get out!

Qi Mingyu: I don’t want to QAQ, my dear, I’m wrong, please forgive me.

Qi Yue: Haha

Baozi: Humph~

What is love, love comes to you quietly when you don’t know it and you don’t know how to cherish it. After that I suddenly found out that I…. regret it.>
